item.description: 211004 Working off yesterday’s check list Notes/Project Pages _0941 Notes/Project Index Github SVG on Notes/Projects (fill colour/hover) Update Stats Colouring Stats for Latest and Start Date are fucking backwards kek Spacing between Project Containers needs to be bigger On the Notes/Project Index the Projects Tags Hover style Single Page Corrections _1012
